languages.text: "Или..." {n}Взгляд Соломона пронзителен и направлен вам в глаза.{/n} "Ты просто прикажешь мне остаться, и я останусь. Император не случайно даровал тебе привилегию отдавать приказы. Если ты решишь так — значит, рядом с тобой мои место и долг".

"Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."
languages.original_text: "Или..." {n}Взгляд Соломона пронзителен и направлен вам в глаза.{/n} "Ты просто прикажешь мне остаться, и я останусь. Император не случайно даровал тебе привилегию отдавать приказы. Если ты решишь так — значит, рядом с тобой мои место и долг".

traits.locale_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

"Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

"Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

"Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

"Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

languages.text: 「もしくは…」{n}ソロモーンの視線は鋭く、まっすぐにあなたを貫いた。{/n}「あなたが私に残れと命じるのなら、私はそうします。皇帝陛下があなたに指揮権を授けたのは、偶然ではありません。あなたが私に同行を命じるのなら、私の居場所も、務めも、すべてはあなたのそばにあります」
languages.original_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

traits.locale_text: 「もしくは…」{n}ソロモーンの視線は鋭く、まっすぐにあなたを貫いた。{/n}「あなたが私に残れと命じるのなら、私はそうします。皇帝陛下があなたに指揮権を授けたのは、偶然ではありません。あなたが私に同行を命じるのなら、私の居場所も、務めも、すべてはあなたのそばにあります」

languages.text: "Oder ..." {n}Solomornes bohrender Blick begegnet deinem.{/n} "Ihr befehlt mir einfach, zu bleiben, dann werde ich das tun. Der Imperator hat Euch nicht zufällig das Privileg der Befehlsgewalt gewährt. Wenn Ihr meine Anwesenheit wünscht, sind mein Platz und meine Pflicht an Eurer Seite."
languages.original_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

traits.locale_text: "Oder ..." {n}Solomornes bohrender Blick begegnet deinem.{/n} "Ihr befehlt mir einfach, zu bleiben, dann werde ich das tun. Der Imperator hat Euch nicht zufällig das Privileg der Befehlsgewalt gewährt. Wenn Ihr meine Anwesenheit wünscht, sind mein Platz und meine Pflicht an Eurer Seite."

languages.text: « Ou alors... {n}Le regard de Solomorne se fiche dans le vôtre.{/n} Ordonnez-moi de rester, et je vous obéirai. Ce n'est pas un hasard si l'Empereur vous a confié le privilège du commandement. Si vous m'ordonnez de rester à vos côtés, alors j'accomplirai mon devoir avec diligence. »
languages.original_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

traits.locale_text: « Ou alors... {n}Le regard de Solomorne se fiche dans le vôtre.{/n} Ordonnez-moi de rester, et je vous obéirai. Ce n'est pas un hasard si l'Empereur vous a confié le privilège du commandement. Si vous m'ordonnez de rester à vos côtés, alors j'accomplirai mon devoir avec diligence. »

languages.text: «O bien...». {n}La penetrante mirada de Solomorne se cruza con la tuya.{/n} «Usted me ordenará que me quede, y yo me quedaré. El Emperador no le otorgó el privilegio del mando por mera casualidad. Si requiere mi presencia, entonces mi deber y mi lugar están a su lado».
languages.original_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

traits.locale_text: «O bien...». {n}La penetrante mirada de Solomorne se cruza con la tuya.{/n} «Usted me ordenará que me quede, y yo me quedaré. El Emperador no le otorgó el privilegio del mando por mera casualidad. Si requiere mi presencia, entonces mi deber y mi lugar están a su lado».

languages.text: “或者……”{n}索罗蒙直直地凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“只要你开口让我留下，我就会留在你身边。帝皇赐予了你指挥的权能，这并非偶然。只要你命令我与你同行，我的岗位与职责便始终都会在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

traits.locale_text: “或者……”{n}索罗蒙直直地凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“只要你开口让我留下，我就会留在你身边。帝皇赐予了你指挥的权能，这并非偶然。只要你命令我与你同行，我的岗位与职责便始终都会在你身边。”

languages.text: "Ya da..." {n}Solomorne'un delici bakışları doğrudan gözlerinle buluşuyor.{/n} "Kalmamı emredersin, ben de kalırım. İmparator'un sana bahşetmiş olduğu komuta ayrıcalığı tesadüf değil. Burada olmamı emretmeyi seçersen yerim, senin yanın olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Or..." {n}Solomorne's gaze is piercing and bores right into yours.{/n} "You will simply order me to stay, and I will. The Emperor did not grant you the privilege of command by chance. If you choose to command my presence, then my place and my duty is at your side."

traits.locale_text: "Ya da..." {n}Solomorne'un delici bakışları doğrudan senin gözlerinle buluşuyor.{/n} "Kalmamı emredersin, ben de kalırım. İmparator'un sana bahşettiği komuta ayrıcalığı tesadüf değildir. Burada olmamı emretmeyi seçersen o hâlde benim yerim senin yanındır."
